author: Al Jazeera
title: US states release 'low-risk' inmates over coronavirus fears
description: 'Jails can be incubators for disease so we have to take bold and drastic steps,' an official said.
content:
The state of New Jersey plans to release "low-risk" inmates serving county jail sentences to limit the spread of the coronavirus, the governor said on Monday.
The announcement follows an order late Sunday night signed by Stuart Rabner, chief justice of the s… [+1883 chars]
